static member GetActivities : Android.Content.Context * int * Android.Content.Intent[] * Android.App.PendingIntentFlags -> Android.App.PendingIntent

Docs.param: The Context in which this PendingIntent should start the activity.
Private request code for the sender
Array of Intents of the activities to be launched.

May be Android.App.PendingIntent.FLAG_ONE_SHOT, Android.App.PendingIntent.FLAG_NO_CREATE, , , or any of the flags as supported by to control which unspecified parts of the intent that can be supplied when the actual send happens.
Docs.summary: Like M:Android.App.PendingIntent.GetActivity(Android.Content.Context,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32), but allows an array of Intents to be supplied.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (Android.App.Result code, Android.App.PendingIntent.IOnFinished onFinished, Android.OS.Handler handler);
.method public hidebysig instance void Send(valuetype Android.App.Result code, class Android.App.PendingIntent/IOnFinished onFinished, class Android.OS.Handler handler) cil managed
member this.Send : Android.App.Result * Android.App.PendingIntent.IOnFinished * Android.OS.Handler -> unit

Docs.param: Result code to supply back to the PendingIntent's target.
The object to call back on when the send has completed, or null for no callback.
Handler identifying the thread on which the callback should happen. If null, the callback will happen from the thread pool of the process.
Docs.summary: Perform the operation associated with this PendingIntent, allowing the caller to be notified when the send has completed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws CanceledException if the PendingIntent is no longer allowing more intents to be sent through it.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (Android.Content.Context context, Android.App.Result code, Android.Content.Intent intent);
.method public hidebysig instance void Send(class Android.Content.Context context, valuetype Android.App.Result code, class Android.Content.Intent intent) cil managed
member this.Send : Android.Content.Context * Android.App.Result * Android.Content.Intent -> unit

Docs.param: The Context of the caller.
Result code to supply back to the PendingIntent's target.

Additional Intent data. See for information on how this is applied to the original Intent. If flag Android.App.PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE was set when this pending intent was created, this argument will be ignored.
Docs.summary: Perform the operation associated with this PendingIntent, allowing the caller to specify information about the Intent to use.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws CanceledException if the PendingIntent is no longer allowing more intents to be sent through it.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (Android.Content.Context context, Android.App.Result code, Android.Content.Intent intent, Android.App.PendingIntent.IOnFinished onFinished, Android.OS.Handler handler);

.method public hidebysig instance void Send(class Android.Content.Context context, valuetype Android.App.Result code, class Android.Content.Intent intent, class Android.App.PendingIntent/IOnFinished onFinished, class Android.OS.Handler handler) cil managed
member this.Send : Android.Content.Context * Android.App.Result * Android.Content.Intent * Android.App.PendingIntent.IOnFinished * Android.OS.Handler -> unit

Docs.param: The Context of the caller. This may be null if intent is also null.
Result code to supply back to the PendingIntent's target.

Additional Intent data. See for information on how this is applied to the original Intent. Use null to not modify the original Intent. If flag Android.App.PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE was set when this pending intent was created, this argument will be ignored.
The object to call back on when the send has completed, or null for no callback.
Handler identifying the thread on which the callback should happen. If null, the callback will happen from the thread pool of the process.
Docs.summary: Perform the operation associated with this PendingIntent, allowing the caller to specify information about the Intent to use and be notified when the send has completed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws CanceledException if the PendingIntent is no longer allowing more intents to be sent through it.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (Android.Content.Context context, Android.App.Result code, Android.Content.Intent intent, Android.App.PendingIntent.IOnFinished onFinished, Android.OS.Handler handler, string requiredPermission);

.method public hidebysig instance void Send(class Android.Content.Context context, valuetype Android.App.Result code, class Android.Content.Intent intent, class Android.App.PendingIntent/IOnFinished onFinished, class Android.OS.Handler handler, string requiredPermission) cil managed
member this.Send : Android.Content.Context * Android.App.Result * Android.Content.Intent * Android.App.PendingIntent.IOnFinished * Android.OS.Handler * string -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: pendingIntent.Send (context, code, intent, onFinished, handler, requiredPermission)

Docs.param: The Context of the caller. This may be null if intent is also null.
Result code to supply back to the PendingIntent's target.

Additional Intent data. See for information on how this is applied to the original Intent. Use null to not modify the original Intent. If flag Android.App.PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE was set when this pending intent was created, this argument will be ignored.
The object to call back on when the send has completed, or null for no callback.
Handler identifying the thread on which the callback should happen. If null, the callback will happen from the thread pool of the process.

Name of permission that a recipient of the PendingIntent is required to hold. This is only valid for broadcast intents, and corresponds to the permission argument in . If null, no permission is required.
Docs.summary: Perform the operation associated with this PendingIntent, allowing the caller to specify information about the Intent to use and be notified when the send has completed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: Throws CanceledException if the PendingIntent is no longer allowing more intents to be sent through it.
